zh.title: Solana/美元技术分析：[震荡整理趋势]
zh.content:
当前，Solana（SOL）的价格在143.85附近震荡整理，24小时变化仅为0.10%，显示出市场情绪相对平稳。价格在143.51和143.99之间波动，表明短期内缺乏明确的方向性走势。投资者需关注是否会突破这一区间，以决定后续的交易策略。

在技术指标方面，虽然RSI未提供，但MACD值为0.11241370，显示出当前动能略微偏向于上行。20日简单移动平均线（SMA）在144.21650，表明短期内价格仍低于该水平，可能构成一定的阻力。若价格持续无法突破这一阻力，可能会引发回调。

支撑位方面，143.51为近期低点，若跌破该水平，则可能加剧下行风险，投资者需密切关注。而143.99作为短期阻力位，若突破将为后续上涨提供动力，并可能挑战更高的价格区间。 

综合来看，建议投资者在该区间内灵活操作，若价格突破阻力位可考虑适量买入，同时关注支撑位的保护。一旦市场出现明显趋势，及时调整策略以应对潜在风险和机会。

en.title: Solana vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Solana (SOL) is currently trading at $143.85, reflecting a minor 24-hour change of 0.10%. The price has shown resilience, navigating between a high of $143.99 and a low of $143.51. This narrow range suggests a consolidating market, where traders are awaiting a catalyst for a more definitive price movement. The overall trend appears to be cautiously bullish, as the price hovers close to the 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) of $144.22, which acts as a dynamic support level.

In the absence of the Relative Strength Index (RSI) data, we turn our attention to the Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD), which currently stands at 0.1124. This positive value indicates that the momentum is leaning towards the bullish side, although the lack of a signal line makes it difficult to gauge the strength of this trend. Traders should monitor any crossover that may occur, as this could provide clearer signals for entry or exit points in the near term.

Support levels are established at the recent low of $143.51, while the recent high of $143.99 serves as immediate resistance. A breakout above $144 would likely attract more buying interest, pushing the price towards the next resistance level. Conversely, a drop below $143.51 could signal a reversal, prompting traders to reassess their positions. 

Given the current market dynamics, a cautious bullish stance may be advisable. Traders could consider entering long positions if SOL breaks above the $144 resistance, targeting higher levels while maintaining stop-loss orders just below the recent low. Conversely, if the price fails to hold above the support level at $143.51, it may be prudent to exit or short, depending on the broader market sentiment.
